about_me.intro: Hi! I'm Taylor, a software developer with 3 years of experience who's passionate about leveraging AI to enhance development workflows. I'm known for being a quick learner and early adopter of new technologies, especially AI tools.
about_me.personality: I approach problems with curiosity and aren't afraid to experiment with cutting-edge tools. My colleagues often come to me when they want to explore new AI-powered development approaches.
fun_facts: I've been using AI coding assistants since they were in beta
I built this portfolio entirely using agentic coding techniques
I love finding creative ways to automate repetitive tasks

current_role.title: Software Developer
current_role.story: I've spent my career focused on web development, but what sets me apart is my enthusiasm for AI-assisted development. I've been instrumental in introducing AI tools to my team and helping colleagues adapt to new workflows.

key_achievements: Led adoption of AI coding tools within my development team
Reduced development time by 30% through strategic use of AI assistants
Mentored colleagues on prompt engineering and AI workflow optimization

specialties: Modern web development with AI enhancement

current_project.name: AI-Powered Portfolio
current_project.description: This very website! Built entirely using agentic coding techniques to demonstrate AI-first development workflows.
current_project.story: I challenged myself to build this portfolio using only AI-assisted coding, documenting the entire process to showcase modern development workflows.

conversation_starters: Tell me about your experience with AI coding tools
What projects have you worked on recently?
How do you approach learning new technologies?
What makes you different from other developers?
